title: RN Telemetry Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: They were fast with the hiring process. Interviewed by both RN and HR director.  Overall a positive experience. They mostly asked traditional questions and not much scenario questions
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be a nurse

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was welcoming. Interviewed first with the CNO. Interviewed with hiring manager and one other staff member on the unit. Process did not take long, very fast and efficient.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself and why are you interested in working for this hospital?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center (Los Angeles, CA) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: Easy. Basic questions. Interviewer did not seem to be interested in new grad, even though it said New Grad Welcome. They are only interested in nurses with past experience.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose to be a nurse?

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center (Alhambra, CA) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: Sent my resume through e-mail. Got a call the next day and was asked if I was available for an interview the next day. I was interviewed by the Human Resources Director at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center.
Interview Questions: What area would you like to work?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center (Alhambra, CA) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: First met with HR director, who asked me what departments I was interested in. Met with ICU director and interview was very laid back. She asked me why I wanted to work there and what assets I could bring to the nursing team. Talked about the hiring process and was very informative. Not intimidating at all.
Interview Questions: Why do we think we should hire you?

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center (Alhambra, CA) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: This was a 2 day job fair.  2 panel interview.  Brief interview, comfortable and relaxed.  Tour of hospital of different departments and units prior to interview.  Application filled out and resume submitted.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to be a nurse?

title: Safety Attendant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center (Alhambra, CA) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: Did my interviews, came back for TB testing (there will be two TB tests required, physical at the clinic next door). You will be asked questions based on the job requirements. Not difficult. Then there will be orientation. Hospital is great for putting together a greatly organized and very consistent orientation.
Interview Questions: Are you available to work weekends?

title: Admitting Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Brief, quick and straight forward. Just be honest with them and they will take you right in. There are lots of other people interviewing at the same time so just be patient.
Interview Questions: Why do you think you would be a good fit for this facility?

title: RN New Grad Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: The interview was brief and confused. No mention of salary or position available. There is no description of job. The interview didn't read the resume and figured out the applicant's current job. It was a waste of time.

title: EKG Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center (Alhambra, CA) in Jul 2013
Interview Descriptions: Professional and easy going. No trick questions and director was very nice. Process was swift and in order and the secretary was very helpful as well. As soon as interview was over I was directed to speak to cardiology manager who was also vey nice and professional. Excellent experience with this hospital.
Interview Questions: Why do you want o work for Alhambra?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Alhambra Hospital Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: I applied and was called for an interview after a week.
